name: Magnified Malice (Game Jam)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 38 Game Jam.

Overview

Magnifying Malice is a survival game where you must avoid being burnt by a giant magnifying glass. You must also feed your hungry queen by bringing her food back to the hill. The magnifying glass will target the ant hill and burn it down. So distract it by leading it to reflective glass which stuns the magnifying glass.

Objectives:

Feed the queen by bringing her food.

Don't let the magnifying glass go over the hill.

Distract it by leading it to glass.

Controls:

WASD: Movement

Hold Space: Jump / Glide

Mouse 1 or E: Pick up food

Mouse 2: Rotate player
